title: Enhancing Customer Service Competencies: Online Collaborative Science Project Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of foundational scientific concepts and ability to use digital tools
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can effectively utilize online collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Padlet) to design scientific inquiry projects
Learners can objectively evaluate their own and others' contributions during science project implementation through peer assessment and feedback systems
Learner groups can apply digital etiquette and conflict management strategies to resolve issues arising during online collaborative activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
